name: BooWoo - the Heart Hero
description:
It was a dark and wuthering night.

Max had already gone to bed when 
he heard a disturbing sound;

"booo woooo"

What was that? “MOM? DAD? ANYONE?”
Noone answered his frightened call for help.
He grabbed his best rubber sword and got out of bed.
“Anyone there?”

He set out on a mission, to reach his parents’ bedroom and shouted to the shadows:
“MY NAME IS MAXWELL BROOKS, AND I AM NOT AFRAID OF ANY LIVING CREATURE!”

But soon he came to realize... It was not the living whom he should fear... It was the dead!

Only the living energy of 20 hearts would be strong enough to defeat the roaming dead! Maxwell had to get to his parents... there was no going back

Keep up!

Game by Jakob Bjerg
VidoGames entertainment 2020

Alt+Enter for full screen
